items.ja: Leeds avoid upset with second-half comeback against Derby

items.text_for_match: Leeds avoid upset with second-half comeback against Derby James Justin scored his first goal for Leeds United since joining from Leicester City in the summer, in a second-half comeback after Derby County took the lead thanks to a Ben Brereton Diaz strike.
